column18: 06/03/2015: Assailants attacked and attempted to seize Marinka town, Donetsk oblast, Ukraine. At least 85 people, including five soldiers and 80 assailants, were killed and 140 others, including 101 soldiers and 39 assailants, were wounded in the ensuing clash. Additionally at least one soldier, Roman Marchenko, was abducted and released as of June 7th, 2015. The Donetsk People's Republic claimed responsibility for the incident.
